problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦,OC是⊙O的半径,OC⊥AB于点D,若AB=8,OD=3,则⊙O的半径等于()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of ⊙O, OC is the radius of ⊙O, OC ⊥ AB is at point D, if AB = N_0, OD = N_1, then the radius of ⊙O is equal to ()
raw_answer: 【解答】解:∵AB是⊙O的弦,OC是⊙O的半径,OC⊥AB于点D,AB=8,∴AD=\frac{1}{2}AB=\frac{1}{2}×8=4,在Rt△AOD中,∵AD=4,OD=3,∴OA=√{AD²+OD²}=√{4²+3²}=5．
